com.cloudbees.plugins.flow.BuildFlow.description: TODO: Better description. Build, package and stage a Scala release. Nightly downloads go to http://www.scala-lang.org/files/archive/nightly/2.11.x/ Regular ones to http://www.scala-lang.org/files/archive/.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: repo_user
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The github username for the repo to clone.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: repo_ref
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The git ref at ${repo_user}/${repo_name} to build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SCALA_VER_BASE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: When set, a release with version "$SCALA_VER_BASE$SCALA_VER_SUFFIX" will be built. Same effect as for tagging $repo_ref as "v$SCALA_VER_BASE$SCALA_VER_SUFFIX".

com.cloudbees.plugins.flow.BuildFlow.dsl:
repo_user = build.buildVariableResolver.resolve("repo_user") repo_name = build.buildVariableResolver.resolve("repo_name") repo_ref = build.buildVariableResolver.resolve("repo_ref").take(12) ver = params["SCALA_VER_BASE"] + params["SCALA_VER_SUFFIX"] build.setDisplayName("[${build.number}] Scala dist ${ver} $repo_user/$repo_name#$repo_ref")
if (params.repo_ref) buildParams = params else buildParams = params + [ "repo_ref" : "v$ver" ]
buildRun = build(buildParams, "scala-2.11.x-integrate-bootstrap")
upstreamBuild = buildRun.build // for testing, to avoid re-running the main build: upstreamBuild = jenkins.model.Jenkins.instance.items.find{it.name == "scala-2.11.x-integrate-bootstrap"}.builds[0] // defines repo_ref, version, sbtDistVersionOverride upstreamPropsArtifact = upstreamBuild.artifacts.find{it.name == "jenkins.properties"}
if (upstreamPropsArtifact == null) { out.println('Error: bootstrap did not publish "jenkins.properties" artifact, unable to proceed.') build.state.setResult(Result.FAILURE) return }
buildVersionProps = new java.util.Properties() buildVersionProps.load(new java.io.FileInputStream(upstreamPropsArtifact.file))
testParams = buildParams + buildVersionProps
parallel ( { retry(2, { build(testParams, "scala-2.11.x-integrate-community-build") }) }, { build(testParams, "scala-2.11.x-release-package-unix") }, { build(testParams, "scala-2.11.x-release-package-windows") } )
build(testParams, "scala-2.11.x-release-smoketest")
build(testParams, "scala-2.11.x-release-website-archives")
build(testParams, "scala-2.11.x-release-website-update-api")
